mapper.sql: RR.f_id as RRid,RR.f_num as RRnum,RR.f_num_tail as RRnumTail,RR.f_num_tail_char_order as RRnumTailCharOrder,RR.f_num_tail_digit_order as RRnumTailDigitOrder,RR.f_unit_name as RRunitName,RR.f_desc as RRdesc,RR.t_building_f_id as RRtBuildingFId,RR.f_creater as RRcreater,RR.f_check_status as RRcheckStatus,RR.t_building_f_id_tmp as RRtBuildingFIdTmp,RR.f_code as RRcode,RR.f_contract_no as RRcontractNo,RR.t_property_proprietor_f_id as RRtPropertyProprietorFId,RR.f_source_type as RRsourceType,RR.f_validate_user_id as RRvalidateUserId,RR.f_validate_status as RRvalidateStatus,date_format(RR.f_validate_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RRvalidateTime,RR.f_validate_room_id as RRvalidateRoomId,RR.f_room_size as RRroomSize,RR.f_property_fee_per_m2 as RRpropertyFeePerM2,RR.f_prop_money as RRpropMoney,RR.f_old_validate_user_id as RRoldValidateUserId,RR.f_mini_discount as RRminiDiscount,RR.f_mini_discount_id as RRminiDiscountId,date_format(RR.f_mini_discount_period_start,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RRminiDiscountPeriodStart,date_format(RR.f_mini_discount_period_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RRminiDiscountPeriodEnd,RR.f_sale_status as RRsaleStatus,RR.f_living_status as RRlivingStatus,RR.f_lease_status as RRleaseStatus

RR1.f_id as RR1id,RR1.f_num as RR1num,RR1.f_num_tail as RR1numTail,RR1.f_num_tail_char_order as RR1numTailCharOrder,RR1.f_num_tail_digit_order as RR1numTailDigitOrder,RR1.f_unit_name as RR1unitName,RR1.f_desc as RR1desc,RR1.t_building_f_id as RR1tBuildingFId,RR1.f_creater as RR1creater,RR1.f_check_status as RR1checkStatus,RR1.t_building_f_id_tmp as RR1tBuildingFIdTmp,RR1.f_code as RR1code,RR1.f_contract_no as RR1contractNo,RR1.t_property_proprietor_f_id as RR1tPropertyProprietorFId,RR1.f_source_type as RR1sourceType,RR1.f_validate_user_id as RR1validateUserId,RR1.f_validate_status as RR1validateStatus,date_format(RR1.f_validate_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RR1validateTime,RR1.f_validate_room_id as RR1validateRoomId,RR1.f_room_size as RR1roomSize,RR1.f_property_fee_per_m2 as RR1propertyFeePerM2,RR1.f_prop_money as RR1propMoney,RR1.f_old_validate_user_id as RR1oldValidateUserId,RR1.f_mini_discount as RR1miniDiscount,RR1.f_mini_discount_id as RR1miniDiscountId,date_format(RR1.f_mini_discount_period_start,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RR1miniDiscountPeriodStart,date_format(RR1.f_mini_discount_period_end,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as RR1miniDiscountPeriodEnd,RR1.f_sale_status as RR1saleStatus,RR1.f_living_status as RR1livingStatus,RR1.f_lease_status as RR1leaseStatus

if.test: _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == null or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == '' or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == false or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM != true

mapper.sql: UPDATE t_real_room ,f_num=#{num} ,f_num_tail=#{numTail} ,f_num_tail_char_order=#{numTailCharOrder} ,f_num_tail_digit_order=#{numTailDigitOrder} ,f_unit_name=#{unitName} ,f_desc=#{desc} ,t_building_f_id=#{tBuildingFId} ,f_creater=#{creater} ,f_check_status=#{checkStatus} ,t_building_f_id_tmp=#{tBuildingFIdTmp} ,f_code=#{code} ,f_contract_no=#{contractNo} ,t_property_proprietor_f_id=#{tPropertyProprietorFId} ,f_source_type=#{sourceType} ,f_validate_user_id=#{validateUserId} ,f_validate_status=#{validateStatus} ,f_validate_time=str_to_date(#{validateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_validate_room_id=#{validateRoomId} ,f_room_size=#{roomSize} ,f_property_fee_per_m2=#{propertyFeePerM2} ,f_prop_money=#{propMoney} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{sys0DelUser} ,f_old_validate_user_id=#{oldValidateUserId} ,f_mini_discount=#{miniDiscount} ,f_mini_discount_id=#{miniDiscountId} ,f_mini_discount_period_start=str_to_date(#{miniDiscountPeriodStart},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_mini_discount_period_end=str_to_date(#{miniDiscountPeriodEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sale_status=#{saleStatus} ,f_living_status=#{livingStatus} ,f_lease_status=#{leaseStatus} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{id}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_real_room ,f_num=#{item.num} ,f_num_tail=#{item.numTail} ,f_num_tail_char_order=#{item.numTailCharOrder} ,f_num_tail_digit_order=#{item.numTailDigitOrder} ,f_unit_name=#{item.unitName} ,f_desc=#{item.desc} ,t_building_f_id=#{item.tBuildingFId} ,f_creater=#{item.creater} ,f_check_status=#{item.checkStatus} ,t_building_f_id_tmp=#{item.tBuildingFIdTmp} ,f_code=#{item.code} ,f_contract_no=#{item.contractNo} ,t_property_proprietor_f_id=#{item.tPropertyProprietorFId} ,f_source_type=#{item.sourceType} ,f_validate_user_id=#{item.validateUserId} ,f_validate_status=#{item.validateStatus} ,f_validate_time=str_to_date(#{item.validateTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_validate_room_id=#{item.validateRoomId} ,f_room_size=#{item.roomSize} ,f_property_fee_per_m2=#{item.propertyFeePerM2} ,f_prop_money=#{item.propMoney} ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{item.sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{item.sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{item.sys0DelUser} ,f_old_validate_user_id=#{item.oldValidateUserId} ,f_mini_discount=#{item.miniDiscount} ,f_mini_discount_id=#{item.miniDiscountId} ,f_mini_discount_period_start=str_to_date(#{item.miniDiscountPeriodStart},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_mini_discount_period_end=str_to_date(#{item.miniDiscountPeriodEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sale_status=#{item.saleStatus} ,f_living_status=#{item.livingStatus} ,f_lease_status=#{item.leaseStatus} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{item.id}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_real_room WHERE 1=1 AND f_id IN
#{item}
